verses.verse: On <WG2250> that<WG1565> day<WG2250> went<WG1831> Jesus<WG2424> out of<WG575> the house<WG3614>, and sat<WG2521> by<WG3844> the sea side<WG2281>.

And <WG2532> there were gathered unto<WG4314> him<WG846> great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793>, so that<WG5620> he<WG846> entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> a boat<WG4143>, and sat<WG2521>; and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3793> multitude<WG3793> stood<WG2476> on<WG1909> the beach<WG123>.
And <WG2532> he spake<WG2980> to them<WG846> many things<WG4183> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>, saying<WG3004>, Behold<WG2400>, the sower<WG4687> went forth<WG1831> to sow<WG4687>;
and <WG2532> as<WG1722> he<WG846> sowed<WG3303>, some<WG3739> seeds fell<WG4098> by<WG3844> the way side<WG3598>, and<WG2532> the birds<WG4071> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> devoured<WG2719> them<WG846>:

and others<WG243> fell<WG4098> upon<WG1909> the rocky places<WG4075>, where<WG3699> they had<WG2192> not<WG3756> much<WG4183> earth<WG1093>: and<WG2532> straightway<WG2532> they sprang up<WG1816>, because<WG1223> they had<WG2192> no<WG3361> deepness<WG899> of earth<WG1093>:
and <WG1161> when the sun<WG2246> was risen<WG393>, they were scorched<WG2739>; and<WG2532> because<WG1223> they had<WG2192> no<WG3361> root<WG4491>, they withered away<WG3583>.
And <WG1161> others<WG243> fell<WG4098> upon<WG1909> the thorns<WG173>; and<WG2532> the thorns<WG173> grew up<WG305> and<WG2532> choked<WG638> them<WG846>:

and <WG2532> others<WG243> fell<WG4098> upon<WG1909> the good<WG2570> ground<WG1093>, and<WG2532> yielded<WG1325> fruit<WG3303>, some<WG3739> a hundredfold<WG1161>, some<WG3739> sixty<WG1161>, some<WG3739> thirty<WG5144>.
He that hath<WG2192> ears<WG3775>, let him hear<WG191>.
And <WG2532> the disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334>, and said<WG2036> unto him<WG1223>, Why<WG5101> speakest thou<WG2980> unto them<WG846> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>?

And he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Unto you<WG5213> it is given<WG1325> to know<WG1097> the mysteries<WG3466> of the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772>, but<WG1161> to them<WG1565> it is<WG1325> not<WG3756> given<WG1325>.

For <WG1063> whosoever<WG3748> hath<WG2192>, to him<WG846> shall be given<WG1325>, and<WG2532> he shall have abundance<WG4052>: but<WG1161> whosoever<WG3748> hath<WG2192> not<WG3756>, from<WG575> him<WG846> shall be taken away<WG142> even<WG2532> that<WG3739> which he hath<WG2192>.

Therefore <WG5124> speak I<WG2980> to them<WG846> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>; because<WG3754> seeing<WG991> they<WG991> see<WG991> not<WG3756>, and<WG2532> hearing<WG191> they hear<WG191> not<WG3756>, neither<WG3761> do they understand<WG4920>.

And <WG2532> unto<WG1909> them<WG846> is fulfilled<WG378> the prophecy<WG4394> of Isaiah<WG2268>, which saith<WG3004>, By hearing<WG189> ye shall hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> shall<WG4920> in<WG3756> no<WG3361> wise understand<WG4920>; And<WG2532> seeing<WG991> ye shall see<WG991>, and<WG2532> shall<WG1492> in no<WG3361> wise perceive<WG1492>:

For <WG1063> this<WG5127> people<WG2992>'s heart<WG2588> is waxed gross<WG3975>, And<WG2532> their ears<WG3775> are dull of<WG917> hearing<WG191>, And<WG2532> their<WG846> eyes<WG3788> they have closed<WG2576>; Lest haply<WG3379> they should perceive<WG1492> with<WG3788> their eyes<WG3788>, And<WG2532> hear<WG191> with<WG3788> their ears<WG3775>, And<WG2532> understand<WG4920> with<WG3775> their heart<WG191>, And<WG2532> should turn again<WG1994>, And<WG2532> I should heal<WG2390> them<WG846>.
But <WG1161> blessed<WG3107> are your<WG5216> eyes<WG3788>, for<WG3754> they see<WG991>; and<WG2532> your<WG5216> ears<WG3775>, for<WG3754> they hear<WG191>.

For <WG1063> verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, that<WG3754> many<WG4183> prophets<WG4396> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> men<WG1492> desired<WG1937> to see<WG1492> the things which<WG3739> ye see<WG1492>, and<WG2532> saw<WG1492> them not<WG3756>; and<WG2532> to hear<WG191> the things which<WG3739> ye hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> heard<WG191> them not<WG3756>.
Hear <WG191> then<WG3767> ye<WG5210> the parable<WG3850> of the sower<WG4687>.

When any one<WG3956> heareth<WG191> the word<WG3056> of the kingdom<WG932>, and<WG2532> understandeth<WG4920> it not<WG3361>, then cometh<WG2064> the evil<WG4190> one<WG2532>, and snatcheth away<WG726> that which hath been sown<WG4687> in<WG1722> his<WG846> heart<WG2588>. This<WG3778> is<WG2076> he that was sown<WG4687> by<WG3844> the way side<WG3598>.

And <WG1161> he that was sown<WG4687> upon<WG1909> the rocky places<WG4075>, this<WG3778> is<WG2076> he that heareth<WG191> the word<WG3056>, and<WG2532> straightway<WG2117> with<WG3326> joy<WG5479> receiveth<WG2983> it<WG846>;

yet <WG1161> hath he<WG2192> not<WG3756> root<WG4491> in<WG1722> himself<WG1438>, but<WG235> endureth<WG2076> for a while<WG4340>; and when<WG1161> tribulation<WG2347> or<WG2228> persecution<WG1375> ariseth<WG1096> because of<WG1223> the word<WG3056>, straightway<WG2117> he stumbleth<WG4624>.

And <WG1161> he<WG4687> that was sown<WG4687> among<WG1519> the thorns<WG173>, this is<WG2076> he<WG3778> that heareth<WG191> the word<WG3056>; and<WG2532> the care<WG3308> of the<WG5127> world<WG165>, and<WG2532> the deceitfulness<WG539> of riches<WG4149>, choke<WG4846> the word<WG3056>, and<WG2532> he becometh<WG1096> unfruitful<WG175>.

And <WG1161> he that was sown<WG4687> upon<WG1909> the<WG1093> good<WG2570> ground<WG1093>, this is<WG2076> he<WG3778> that heareth<WG191> the word<WG3056>, and<WG2532> understandeth<WG4920> it<WG3739>; who verily<WG1211> beareth fruit<WG2592>, and<WG2532> bringeth forth<WG3303>, some<WG3739> a hundredfold<WG1161>, some<WG3739> sixty<WG1161>, some<WG3739> thirty<WG5144>.

Another <WG243> parable<WG3850> set he before<WG3908> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, The kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is likened unto<WG3666> a man<WG444> that sowed<WG4687> good<WG2570> seed<WG4690> in<WG1722> his<WG846> field<WG68>:

but <WG1161> while<WG1722> men<WG444> slept<WG2518>, his<WG846> enemy<WG2190> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> sowed<WG4687> tares<WG2215> also<WG303> among<WG3319> the wheat<WG4621>, and<WG2532> went away<WG565>.
But <WG1161> when<WG3753> the blade<WG5528> sprang up<WG985> and<WG2532> brought forth<WG4160> fruit<WG2590>, then<WG5119> appeared<WG5316> the tares<WG2215> also<WG2532>.

And <WG1161> the servants<WG1401> of the householder<WG3617> came<WG4334> and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Sir<WG2962>, didst<WG4687> thou not<WG3780> sow<WG4687> good<WG2570> seed<WG4690> in<WG1722> thy<WG4674> field<WG68>? whence<WG4159> then<WG3767> hath it<WG2192> tares<WG2215>?

And he said<WG5346> unto them<WG846>, An enemy<WG2190> hath<WG444> done<WG4160> this<WG1161>. And the servants<WG1401> say<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Wilt thou<WG2309> then<WG3767> that we go<WG565> and gather<WG4816> them<WG846> up<WG4816>?
But <WG1161> he saith<WG5346>, Nay<WG3756>; lest<WG3379> haply while ye gather up<WG4816> the tares<WG2215>, ye root up the<WG1610> wheat<WG4621> with<WG260> them<WG846>.

Let <WG863> both<WG297> grow together<WG4885> until<WG3360> the harvest<WG2326>: and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the time<WG2540> of the harvest<WG2326> I will say<WG2046> to the reapers<WG2327>, Gather up<WG4816> first<WG4412> the tares<WG2215>, and<WG2532> bind<WG1210> them<WG846> in<WG1519> bundles<WG1197> to<WG4314> burn<WG2618> them<WG846>; but<WG1161> gather<WG4863> the wheat<WG4621> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> barn<WG596>.

Another <WG243> parable<WG3850> set he before<WG3908> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, The kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like unto<WG3664> a grain<WG2848> of mustard seed<WG4615>, which<WG3739> a man<WG444> took<WG2983>, and sowed<WG4687> in<WG1722> his<WG846> field<WG68>:

which <WG3739> indeed<WG3303> is<WG2076> less<WG3398> than all<WG3956> seeds<WG4690>; but<WG1161> when<WG3752> it is grown<WG837>, it is<WG2076> greater<WG3173> than the herbs<WG3001>, and<WG2532> becometh<WG1096> a tree<WG1186>, so that<WG5620> the birds<WG4071> of the heaven<WG3772> come<WG2064> and<WG2532> lodge<WG2681> in<WG1722> the branches<WG2798> thereof<WG846>.

Another <WG243> parable<WG3850> spake he<WG2980> unto them<WG846>; The kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like unto<WG3664> leaven<WG2219>, which<WG3739> a woman<WG1135> took<WG2983>, and hid<WG1470> in<WG1519> three<WG5140> measures<WG4568> of meal<WG224>, till<WG2193> it<WG3739> was all<WG3650> leavened<WG2220>.

All <WG3956> these things<WG5023> spake<WG2980> Jesus<WG2424> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850> unto the multitudes<WG3793>; and<WG2532> without<WG5565> a parable<WG3850> spake he<WG2980> nothing<WG3756> unto them<WG846>:

that <WG3704> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which was spoken<WG4483> through<WG1223> the prophet<WG4396>, saying<WG3004>, I will open<WG455> my<WG3450> mouth<WG4750> in<WG1722> parables<WG3850>; I will utter<WG2044> things hidden<WG2928> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world<WG2889>.

Then <WG5119> he<WG2424> left<WG863> the<WG863> multitudes<WG3793>, and went<WG2064> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614>: and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> unto him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Explain<WG5419> unto us<WG2254> the parable<WG3850> of the tares<WG2215> of the field<WG68>.
And he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, He that soweth<WG4687> the good<WG2570> seed<WG4690> is<WG2076> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444>;

and the field<WG68> is<WG2076> the world<WG1161>; and the good<WG2570> seed<WG4690>, these<WG3778> are<WG1526> the sons<WG5207> of the kingdom<WG932>; and the tares<WG2215> are<WG1526> the sons<WG5207> of the evil one<WG4190>;

and the enemy<WG2190> that sowed<WG4687> them<WG846> is<WG2076> the devil<WG1161>: and the harvest<WG2326> is<WG2076> the end<WG4930> of the world<WG165>; and<WG1161> the reapers<WG2327> are<WG1526> angels<WG32>.

As <WG5618> therefore<WG3767> the tares<WG2215> are gathered<WG4816> up and<WG2532> burned<WG2618> with fire<WG4442>; so<WG3779> shall it be<WG2071> in<WG1722> the end<WG4930> of the<WG5127> world<WG165>.

The Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> shall send forth<WG649> his<WG846> angels<WG32>, and<WG2532> they shall gather<WG4816> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> kingdom<WG932> all<WG3956> things that cause stumbling<WG4625>, and<WG2532> them that do<WG4160> iniquity<WG458>,
and <WG2532> shall cast<WG906> them<WG846> into<WG1519> the furnace<WG2575> of fire<WG4442>: there<WG1563> shall be<WG2071> the weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> the gnashing<WG1030> of teeth<WG3599>.

Then <WG5119> shall<WG1584> the righteous<WG1342> shine forth<WG1584> as<WG5613> the sun<WG2246> in<WG1722> the kingdom<WG932> of<WG3962> their<WG846> Father<WG3962>. He that hath<WG2192> ears<WG3775>, let him hear<WG191>.

The <WG3825> kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like unto<WG3664> a treasure<WG2344> hidden<WG2928> in<WG1722> the field<WG68>; which<WG3739> a man<WG444> found<WG2147>, and hid<WG2928>; and<WG2532> in<WG846> his<WG575> joy<WG5479> he goeth<WG5217> and<WG2532> selleth<WG4453> all<WG3956> that<WG3745> he hath<WG2192>, and<WG2532> buyeth<WG59> that<WG3745> field<WG68>.
Again <WG3825>, the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like unto<WG3664> a man<WG444> that is a merchant<WG1713> seeking<WG2212> goodly<WG2570> pearls<WG3135>:
and <WG3739> having found<WG2147> one<WG1520> pearl<WG3135> of great price<WG4186>, he went<WG565> and sold<WG4097> all<WG3956> that<WG3745> he had<WG2192>, and<WG2532> bought<WG59> it<WG846>.

Again <WG3825>, the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like unto<WG3664> a net<WG4522>, that was cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the sea<WG2281>, and<WG2532> gathered<WG4863> of<WG1537> every<WG3956> kind<WG1085>:

which <WG3739>, when<WG3753> it was filled<WG4137>, they drew<WG307> up on<WG1909> the beach<WG123>; and<WG2532> they sat down<WG2523>, and gathered<WG4816> the good<WG2570> into<WG1519> vessels<WG30>, but<WG1161> the bad<WG4550> they cast<WG906> away<WG1854>.

So <WG3779> shall it be<WG2071> in<WG1722> the end<WG4930> of the world<WG165>: the angels<WG32> shall come forth<WG1831>, and<WG2532> sever<WG873> the wicked<WG4190> from<WG1537> among<WG3319> the righteous<WG1342>,
and <WG2532> shall cast<WG906> them<WG846> into<WG1519> the furnace<WG2575> of fire<WG4442>: there<WG1563> shall be<WG2071> the weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> the gnashing<WG1030> of teeth<WG3599>.
Have ye understood<WG4920> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023>? They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Yea<WG3483>.

And <WG1161> he<WG2036> said unto them<WG1223>, Therefore<WG5124> every<WG3956> scribe<WG1122> who hath been made a disciple<WG3100> to the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> like unto<WG3664> a man<WG444> that is a householder<WG3617>, who<WG3748> bringeth forth<WG1544> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> treasure<WG2344> things new<WG2537> and<WG2532> old<WG3820>.
And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> had finished<WG5055> these<WG3778> parables<WG3850>, he departed<WG3332> thence<WG1564>.

And <WG2532> coming<WG2064> into<WG1519> his own<WG846> country<WG3968> he taught<WG1321> them<WG846> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogue<WG4864>, insomuch that<WG5620> they<WG846> were astonished<WG1605>, and<WG2532> said<WG3004>, Whence<WG4159> hath this<WG5129> man this<WG5129> wisdom<WG4678>, and<WG2532> these mighty works<WG1411>?

Is <WG2076> not<WG3756> this<WG3778> the<WG5207> carpenter<WG5045>'s son<WG5207>? is<WG3004> not<WG3780> his<WG846> mother<WG3384> called<WG3004> Mary<WG3137>? and<WG2532> his<WG846> brethren<WG80>, James<WG2385>, and<WG2532> Joseph<WG2500>, and<WG2532> Simon<WG4613>, and<WG2532> Judas<WG2455>?
And <WG2532> his<WG846> sisters<WG79>, are they<WG1526> not<WG3780> all<WG3956> with<WG4314> us<WG2248>? Whence<WG4159> then<WG3767> hath this<WG5129> man all<WG3956> these things<WG5023>?

And <WG2532> they were offended<WG4624> in<WG1722> him<WG846>. But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, A prophet<WG4396> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> without honor<WG1487>, save<WG3361> in<WG1722> his own<WG846> country<WG3968>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> his own<WG846> house<WG3614>.
And <WG2532> he did<WG4160> not<WG3756> many<WG4183> mighty works<WG1411> there<WG1563> because of<WG1223> their<WG846> unbelief<WG570>.
